overview:
Adam Schreiber, Co-Founder & Managing Partner has a broad communications background with experience ranging from public relations, advertising and brand management. Adam started his career at Converseon, a digital marketing agency that spun off from Young & Rubican advertising. From there Adam moved on to Hill & Knowlton, which at the time was the worlds largest revenue PR agency. There, Adam was integral in forming the Health Information Technology group (HIT) spending time working with both global healthcare and technology clients. After leaving H&K, Adam then joined EURO RSCG in its technology strategy group where he helped develop market strategy plans surrounding product launches for major tech clients.

Since founding ConvoNation.com, an online collaboration platform built for facilitating quality content between thought leaders and users, Adam has also held a senior consulting position at Brand & Reputation Management, a reputation strategy firm. Adam works with clients, assisting them with social media strategy and creating communications plans to help them avoid crisis and leverage unique brand attributes.

Adam is a graduate of West Chester University of Pennsylvania with a Bachelor of Science in Political Science with a minor in Journalism. While at West Chester, Adam played 3rd base for its nationally ranked (14th) DII baseball team. Adam is a dual Citizen of Canada and the US.
